title: 12/06/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 12/06/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to former Mike and Mike Co-host Mike Golic. Is there a shot he and Greeny would ever team up again? Notre Dame new Head Coach Marcus Freeman calls in to discuss his new role with the program as well as whether he was offered a job at LSU when Brian Kelly left. And Carson Palmer joins us from LAs Vegas where he will be inducted into the College Football Hall of Fame.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to former Mike and Mike Co-host Mike Golic. Is there a shot he and Greeny would ever team up again? Notre Dame new Head Coach Marcus Freeman calls in to discuss his new role with the program as well as whether he was offered a job at LSU when Brian Kelly left. And Carson Palmer joins us from LAs Vegas where he will be inducted into the College Football Hall of Fame.
